text: ( Source : University of Cincinnati ) CCM 's Studio Series Opens with Award-Winning Musical ' Big River ,' Oct. 8 - 10 Based on Mark Twain 's classic ' The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn ,' this Tony Award-winning show returns to the CCM stage after
